channel.title: Adding a Forum Logo/Banner?
channel.description:
I'm on SMF, and I upload a banner/logo to Imageshack and select the HTML version of the image (because it's the only one it recognises) and I get a red cross in a white box where the logo should be.
Do I need to save it as a specific format? (.png at the moment). Do I need it to be a certain size? It's not big anyway, about 75 x 250.
Do I need to use a dfferent format when pasting the code?
I'm currently in: Current Theme > THEMES AND SETTINGS > Logo Image URL, if that's any help.
Thanks for reading.

item.title: Adding a Forum Logo/Banner?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

K thanks, I’ll let you know if I get it working or not. ;D

Read full topic

I’m on SMF, and I upload a banner/logo to Imageshack and select the HTML version of the image (because it’s the only one it recognises) and I get a red cross in a white box where the logo should be.
